original_text: So Jacob sent the men with his gifts to go on to meet Esau. But he himself stayed in that place for the night.
korean_text: 그 예물은 그에 앞서 보내고 그는 무리 가운데서 밤을 지내다가

sentences.original_text: So Jacob sent the men with his gifts
sentences.korean_translation: 그래서 야곱은 사람들을 선물과 함께 보냈습니다

sentences.original_text: to go on to meet Esau
But he himself stayed in that place
